sql: select distinct con.FST_NAME AS FIRST_NAME, con.LAST_NAME AS LAST_NAME, con.MARITAL_STAT_CD AS MARITAL_STATUS, con.ROW_ID AS CONTACT_ID, con.SOC_SECURITY_NUM as SOC_SECURITY_NUM FROM s_contact con

CONTACT_ID.sql: select distinct con_addr.ADDR_TYPE_CD AS ADDRESS_TYPE, addr.addr_name as ADDRESS, addr.addr as ADDRESS_LINE_1, addr.addr_line_2 as ADDRESS_LINE_2, addr.city as CITY, addr.country as COUNTRY,addr.state as STATE, addr.zipcode as ZIPCODE FROM s_contact con left outer join s_con_addr con_addr on con_addr.CONTACT_ID = con.ROW_ID left outer join s_addr_per addr on addr.row_id = con_addr.addr_per_id WHERE con.ROW_ID = ? AND addr.addr IS NOT NULL
